title: 2008-05-05 The Hoax FLAC, Chiddingfold Club
description:
Band: The Hoax
Date: 5th May 2008
Venue: Chiddingfold Club. Probably the last gig at this venue before it is demolished for redevelopment.

Taper: sonicsavage
Giant Squid mics (without the battery box/bass rolloff) -> iRiver HD340 (running rockbox and recording in CD quality wav format) -> Adobe Audition (EQ and normalisation) -> FLAC -> you

They came on to do a final encore while I was at the merch stall buying a copy of their album, so I missed it and it is not present on this recording.


Celebrating the 10th anniversary of their highly acclaimed 3rd album `Humdinger?, The HOAX are briefly re-forming to appear at two overseas blues festivals, and only one exclusive UK date at Chiddingfold!

The HOAX rapidly evolved from a Wiltshire village band of school-friends, to become undoubtedly the best, most original, and most exciting blues band of the 90?s, with a huge following of fans throughout Europe. In 1995 they were awarded both `Blues Band of the Year? and `Blues Album? of the year, and they also embarked on an extensive tour of the USA, opening for Buddy Guy. They were also guests on the TV show `Later with Jools Holland?. With the blues world at their feet, in 1999 the band confounded all their world-wide fans by disbanding, in favour of pursuing individual careers. 

The band members are now dispersed around the world, and hence further `re-unions? are most unlikely. 

?The last time Englishmen played blue-rock with such fire and conviction, they had names like The Yardbirds, John Mayall?s Bluesbreakers, and The Rolling Stones? - `Q? Magazine ****
